MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L39 postcode area of Ormskirk, affecting properties in Station Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:04AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:36PM on 2nd November 2020
